column2:
GoGaucho is a mobile app developed by UCSB students, for UCSB students. It serves as a powerful tool for thousands of Gauchos. Everything from your GOLD schedule to dining hall menus, all in one place!

   [ Dining ]
- View today's menus
- View weekly menus
- Mark your favorite dishes
- Watch cameras outside Dining Commons
- Check your meal plans in Widget
- Receive urgent campus notification

   [ Maps ]
- Campus map
- Search by building's name
- Search by building's code

   [ Schedule ]
- Get the schedule on via UCSB NetID
- Quick view on Widget and Apple Watch
